events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review your qualifications in detail.
Your application has been categorised under the Engineering cluster based on your experience and skill set.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to your case to guide you through the next steps of the hiring process.
The initial screening interview was completed successfully. Your software development knowledge and experience were impressive.
We have scheduled your technical interview for May 10th at 10 AM. Please prepare to discuss your devops and coding skills.
Your technical interview has been completed successfully with excellent problem-solving and software engineering insights.
The HR interview has been scheduled for May 15th at 2 PM. This will cover cultural fit and general employment questions.
Your HR interview was completed positively, showing great alignment with company values and team culture.
We have extended you a formal offer for the Software Engineer role, reflecting your skills and experience discussed throughout the process.
You have accepted the offer, and we are excited to welcome you onboard as a new software developer on our engineering team.
Your onboarding process has officially started. We look forward to your contribution and growth within our engineering department.
The hiring process is now closed successfully. Congratulations on joining the team as a valued engineering professional.
